short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tells you where the music is coming from in your chrome window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be it music, video or ads, it will land you onto the page where the music is coming from. If you multiple tabs acting as sound sources then it will highlight the rest of them. 

Works across multiple chrome windows and even on minimised ones.
